casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Price, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Price (1999), 84 Ohio St.3d 529.]

(No. 98-1973 Submitted January 12, 1999 Decided March 3, 1999.) James J. Mayer, Jr., Richland County Prosecuting Attorney, and Sheryl M. Groff, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
